Texts.Chs: ^orange;基础巢框^reset;在^green;蜂箱^reset;中作为蜜蜂的房子来使用。立马做一个看看。
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Basic Frame^reset; is placed within an ^green;apiary^reset; to act as housing for the bees. Create one now.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;巢框有许多种类^reset;，不同的蜜蜂喜好不同。这需要你来摸索。
Texts.Eng: There are ^green;many types of frames^reset;, and different bees will prefer certain types. You'll need to be creative.
